# Smart TV Control

> Generated by [Unloop](https://unloop.dev) - AI-powered embedded device development

## About

Smart TV interface with streaming, settings, and media controls

**Original prompt:**
> Build a smart tv

## Preview

This is a temporary preview repository. It will be automatically deleted after 24 hours.

To save this project permanently, visit your preview and click "Save to My GitHub".

## Building

```bash
# Requires Rust and Slint
cargo build --release
cargo run
```

## Generated Files

- `ui/main.slint` - Main application shell
- `ui/screens.slint` - Screen components
- `ui/data.slint` - Data model
- `src/main.rs` - Rust entry point
- `Cargo.toml` - Project configuration
